pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ensemble Tool for Predictions from Species Distribution Models // A tool which allows users to create and evaluate ensembles of species distribution model (SDM) predictions. Functionality is offered through R functions or a GUI (R Shiny app). This tool can assist users in identifying spatial uncertainties and making informed conservation and management decisions. The package is further described in Woodman et al (2019) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.13283.
